mapper.select: select * from employee e, department d where e.dept_no = d.dept_no
select employee_no from employee where employee_no = #{employee_no}
mapper.insert: insert into employee (employee_no, dept_no, password, position, birth, authority, name, hiredate, annual_leave) values (#{employee_no}, #{dept_no}, #{password}, #{position}, #{birth}, #{authority}, #{name}, #{hiredate}, #{annual_leave})
insert into photo (photo_name, employee_no, photo_path, photo_size) values (#{photo_name}, #{employee_no}, #{photo_path}, #{photo_size})
mapper.select: select count(*) from employee where authority = #{authority} and employee_no = #{employee_no}
